function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increase in global average temperature","Impact":"Accelerated global warming","Mitigation":"Reducing carbon dioxide emissions, investing in renewable energy","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, carbon capture and storage","People":"Global population","Owner":"International organizations, governments"},{"Description":"Uneven distribution of impacts of climate change","Impact":"Disproportional impact on countries not responsible for climate change","Mitigation":"Supporting adaptation efforts in vulnerable regions, international cooperation on climate change","Technologies":"Climate modeling, early warning systems","People":"Vulnerable populations in affected regions","Owner":"International organizations, governments"},{"Description":"Impacts of climate change on human health","Impact":"Increased burden on human health, disproportionate impact on low-income countries","Mitigation":"Modifying health systems to become more resilient, investing in public health infrastructure","Technologies":"Public health technologies, disease surveillance systems","People":"Healthcare professionals, public health organizations","Owner":"Government health departments, international health organizations"}]}
